miniRender.description: Whether to render only the minimum number of children that satisfy the animation effect
miniRender.description_zh: 是否仅渲染满足动画效果的最少数量的 children

timingFunc.description: Transition velocity curve, the default constant speed transition-timing-function
timingFunc.description_zh: 过渡速度曲线, 默认匀速 transition-timing-function

indicatorType.description: The type of indicator, which can be small squares and dots or not displayed
indicatorType.description_zh: 指示器类型，可为小方块和小圆点或不显示

showArrow.description: Toggles when the arrow is displayed

trigger.description: Slide switch trigger mode, click/hover indicator
trigger.description_zh: 幻灯片切换触发方式, click/hover 指示器

autoPlay.description: Whether to automatically loop the display, or pass in { interval: the time interval for automatic switching (default: 3000), hoverToPause: whether to pause automatic switching when hovering (default: true) } for advanced configuration (2.14.0 supports incoming objects)
autoPlay.description_zh: 是否自动循环展示，或者传入 { interval: 自动切换的时间间隔(默认: 3000), hoverToPause: 鼠标悬浮时是否暂停自动切换(默认: true) } 进行高级配置 (2.14.0 支持传入对象)

:carousel.description: Used to get a Carousel reference with an API method.
:carousel.description_zh: 用于获得带有 API 方法的 Carousel 引用。

events.name: onChange
events.description: The callback function when a slide switches.
events.description_zh: 幻灯片发生切换时的回调函数。
events.params: (index: number, prevIndex: number, isManual: boolean) => void
